welcome-registration-title: Create your account by filling the form bellow.
have-account-title: Do you already have an account?
not-have-account-description: Great to have you here! You can sign up by clicking the button below. Once you’re registered, you’ll be able to log in anytime..
have-account-description: That's awesome!You can login by clicking the button below. To skip next time, you can ask us to remember you login credentials.
